plot: Host Barry Kibrick's conversations with authors Jimmy Breslin ("I Want to Thank My Brain for Remembering Me"), David Viscott ("Emotional Resilience"), David Beer ("Blue Sky Dream: A Memoir of America's Fall from Grace").
